collection.title: Smart Sound Machines (App-Controlled)
collection.description: Take control of your sound environment. Our smart sound machines connect to your phone via an app, allowing you to control the sound, volume, and set timers remotely.

products.title: Audiazx Smart White Noise Sleep Device Portable Sleep Aid for Home & Office
products.body_html:
Audiazx Smart White Noise Sleep Device Portable Sleep Aid for Home & Office

Improve your sleep quality with the Audiazx Smart White Noise Sleep Device. Designed for babies, children, and adults, this compact and portable device creates a calming environment with soothing white noise and gentle soundscapes. Reduce stress, relieve insomnia, and enjoy peaceful, uninterrupted rest anywhere.

Key Features:

  • Smart white noise with multiple calming sound modes

  • Suitable for babies, children, and adults

  • Portable and lightweight design for home, travel, or office use

  • Rechargeable USB-powered battery for long-lasting convenience

  • Sleep aid technology helps reduce stress and insomnia

products.title: Nuzzle White Noise Machine Infant & Child Sleep Aid with Light & Soothing Sounds for Calming & Comfort
products.body_html:
Nuzzle White Noise Machine Infant & Child Sleep Aid with Light & Soothing Sounds for Calming & Comfort

Help your little ones drift into peaceful, undisturbed sleep with the Nuzzle White Noise Machine. Designed for babies and children, this smart sleep aid combines calming sounds, gentle ambient lighting, and intelligent timing features to create the perfect bedtime environment.

With 10 soothing white noise tracks and 8 relaxing music tunes, it helps mask background noise, comfort infants, and improve sleep quality. The 8-color night light adds a warm, cozy atmosphere, while the timed auto-shutdown (30/60/90 mins) ensures energy efficiency and safety.

Its compact design, rechargeable battery, and durable build make it perfect for nurseries, bedrooms, or travel.

Specifications:

  • Material: ABS + PC

  • Size: 100 Ã— 98 Ã— 54mm

  • Color Options: Grey, Black

  • Input Voltage: DC 5V/1A

  • Battery Capacity: 1500mAh polymer

  • Rated Power: 3W

  • Music Tunes: 8 calming melodies

  • White Noise Sources: 10 natural sounds (ocean, rain, birds, fetal heartbeat & more)

  • Night Light: 8 colors with cycle mode

  • Timer Options: 30 / 60 / 90 minutes

  • Charging Port: Type-C (2 hours charge, 5 hours use)

  • Speaker: 40MM Neodymium magnetic speaker (crystal-clear sound)

Why Youâ€™ll Love It:

âœ” Promotes restful sleep for infants & children
âœ” 10 soothing white noise sounds + 8 melodies
âœ” 8-color ambient night light for a calming environment
âœ” Compact, rechargeable & travel-friendly
âœ” Intelligent timer for safe, efficient use

products.title: Snugup Baby Portable Sleeping Aid White Noise USB Sleep Machine for Sleeping & Comfortable
products.body_html:
Snugup Baby Portable Sleeping Aid White Noise USB Sleep Machine for Sleeping & Comfortable

Help your baby relax and sleep peacefully with the Snugup Baby Portable Sleeping Aid Instrument. This USB-powered white noise machine provides calming sounds and gentle music to block distractions, soothe anxiety, and create a comfortable sleep environment for babies, toddlers, and even adults.

How to Use:

  1. Plug the device into a USB power source.

  2. Power on the sleeping aid using the main button.

  3. Choose your preferred sound or music function.

  4. Adjust the timing function for automatic sleep mode.

  5. Place the device near the babyâ€™s sleeping area for optimal results.

  • Compact and portable design for home or travel

  • Provides white noise or music for a calm bedtime routine

  • Easy-to-use USB-powered design for convenience

  • Lightweight and portable â€“ perfect for travel or nursery use

products.title: Zenithaz Smart White Noise Bluetooth Speaker & 15W Wireless Charger for Sleep & Music
products.body_html:
Zenithaz Smart White Noise Bluetooth Speaker & 15W Wireless Charger for Sleep & Music

Create the perfect sleep and relaxation environment with the Zenithaz Smart White Noise Bluetooth Speaker. This multifunctional device combines six soothing sleep sounds, Bluetooth music, and a 15W wireless charger in one compact bedside gadget.

Enjoy stream, Van Gogh, sea wave, split fire, white noise, and rain thunder sounds to drift into a deep, restful sleep. The timing function (15/30/60 min) allows you to set automatic sessions, while the wireless charging output supports 15W/10W/7.5W/5W devices. Its built-in phone holder adds convenience to your bedside or office setup.

Available in SM06 Black and SM06 White, this sleek device is perfect for sleep enthusiasts and tech lovers alike.

Key Features:

  • Bluetooth 5.3 for high-quality wireless music

  • Six soothing sleep sounds for relaxation and better sleep

  • Timing function: 15, 30, 60 minutes for convenience

  • Wireless charger: 15W / 10W / 7.5W / 5W for smartphones

  • Acts as a mobile phone holder

  • Compact, portable, and stylish design

Specifications:

  • Bluetooth Version: V5.3

  • Speaker Power: 5V 500mA / 3W

  • Frequency Response: 20-200k Hz

  • Bluetooth Transmission Distance: 10m

  • Battery: 500 mA

  • Sleep Sounds: Stream, Van Gogh, Sea Wave, Split Fire, White Noise, Rain Thunder

  • Timing Function: 15 / 30 / 60 minutes

  • Wireless Charging Output: 15W / 10W / 7.5W / 5W

  • Color Options: SM06 Black, SM06 White

  • Product Size: 10 Ã— 5.7 cm

Why Youâ€™ll Love It:

  • Multifunctional device combining white noise, music, and wireless charging

  • Six sleep-enhancing sounds for deeper relaxation

  • Timed sessions for energy saving and convenience

  • Sleek design with built-in phone holder

  • Ideal for bedside, office, or travel use
